Text: Re no subjectSee all along its been the women who were trying to get the men drunk I knew I had the wrong approach I was always trying to get the women drunk So now youre telling me if I had just sat back and let the women come to me they would actually bring me beer What a revelation Gosh if I had only known that in college could of saved a lot of money We obviously have too much time on our hands Whos ready for another happy hour gathering of exaccount managers Let me know Steve
